subject: Setup project structure
description:
Create the basic project structure with src/, tests/, and config files.

**Files to create:**
- src/index.ts
- tests/index.test.ts
- tsconfig.json

**Acceptance criteria:**
- All files exist
- TypeScript compiles without errors

subject: Implement core functionality
description:
Implement the main feature in src/index.ts.

**Requirements:**
- Export a main function
- Handle errors gracefully
- Add logging

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Function works as expected
- Errors are caught and logged

subject: Write unit tests
description:
Write comprehensive unit tests for the core functionality.

**Test cases:**
- Happy path
- Error handling
- Edge cases

**Acceptance criteria:**
- All tests pass
- Coverage > 80%

subject: Add documentation
description:
Add README and inline documentation.

**Documentation:**
- README.md with usage examples
- JSDoc comments on exported functions

**Acceptance criteria:**
- README is clear and complete
- All exports have documentation
